author: manunlp
content:
For mac users: I stopped using Docker Desktop and switched to [orbstack](https://orbstack.dev/) a few weeks ago.
(Drop-in replacement). Kurtosis devnets start really faster. I never have the case any more where the last CL starts after genesis.
